pages.title: Built in Teams
pages.text: Includes Built in Teams.$(br)- /DelChoco Player JoinTeam <Color> $(br)-- Join Team of that color$(br)- /DelChoco Player LeaveTeam $(br)--Leave the team you're on$(br)- /DelChoco TeamSettings TeamFriendlyFire <true/false>$(br)-- Turns the teams friendly fire on or off for your team

pages.title: OP Commands
pages.text: Just commands to create all the groups or completely reset the groups & their members (removes them)$(br)$(br)- /DelChoco TeamInitialize <create / refresh>
